B C D E G I L M P R S T V

S

SEND_MODE - Static variable in class com.leestone.twittermention.Variables
Send Mode:
1: SMS - This is the normal operation mode
2: Email - Used for testing to save SMS Credit
3: Both - Send Email & SMS
4: Do Nothing - This will still process Tweets
sendBetavineSMS(String, String) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendSms
Uses the Betavine API to send the SMS
SendEmail - Class in com.leestone.twittermention
This class contains the functions for sending any email messages
SendEmail() - Constructor for class com.leestone.twittermention.SendEmail
 
SendMention - Class in com.leestone.twittermention
Class file handles via what method any mentions should be sent.
SendMention() - Constructor for class com.leestone.twittermention.SendMention
 
sendMention(String, String) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendMention
Handles sorting out how to send the tweet.
sendMentionEmail(String) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendEmail
This will send the mention as an email message.
The email to and subject is based upon the values set in the Variables class.
sendMessage(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendEmail
SendMessage will send an email message based upon the value of the given parameters
SendSms - Class in com.leestone.twittermention
SendSMS handles any mentions which need to be sent via an SMS Message
SendSms() - Constructor for class com.leestone.twittermention.SendSms
 
sendSMS(String) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendSms
Decides which method should be used to send the SMS.
For now, only Betavine is implemented.
The recipient number comes from the static variable RECIPIENT_NUM in the Variables class.
sendTestMessage() - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.SendEmail
This will send a test email message based upon the values in the Variables class.
This is only used when testing the application is working before implementing tweets.
setDateProcessed(Date) - Method in class com.leestone.twittermention.LastMention
 
setId(Long) - Method in class com.leestone.twittermention.LastMention
 
setMyId(int) - Method in class com.leestone.twittermention.LastMention
 
setStatusId(Long) - Method in class com.leestone.twittermention.LastMention
 
SMS_INFO - Static variable in class com.leestone.twittermention.Debug
If wanting successful SMS Info
SMS_MODE - Static variable in class com.leestone.twittermention.Variables
SMS Mode:
1: Betavine - Sends the SMS via the Betavine API
statusId - Variable in class com.leestone.twittermention.LastMention
The statusId of the last mention processed
STORAGE_ID - Static variable in class com.leestone.twittermention.Variables
The ID used to load the Status ID from the datastore
storeLastMentionId(Long) - Static method in class com.leestone.twittermention.DatabaseAssist
Stores the ID of the last mention received.
